name: DJ Master
description:
Start your DJ journey and be a real DJ MASTER!

With all the hit EDM from famous DJs, you can have a true experience of owning night clubs, playing hottest electronic music, dancing with passionate crowds and being the spot of your music fans.

- Play the hottest EDM
More than 50 hit electronic music can be played in our game.

- Operate the most authentic DJ mixer
Use both of your hands, one for tapping the music tiles and one for controlling the cross fader.
The most authentic DJ mixer on your phone gives you the most real experience like a DJ.
Challenge yourselves to play a higher score.

- Run the DJ club of your own around the globe
Over 5 clubs in different metropolis worldwide.
Create your brand to satisfy music fans.

Game Features
- Play licensed hit EDM from famous labels
- Experience authentic control of DJ mixer
- Unlock different music in various clubs
- Run the night club of your own brand
